mapper.select: select t1.id,t1.phone,t1.real_name,t1.is_real_name,t1.is_bind_card,t1.avatars_id,t1.password,t1.pay_password,t1.payment_account, t1.id_card,t1.reg_time,t1.reg_ip,t1.reg_source,t1.invite_code,t1.user_state,t2.phone as invite_name,t1.payment_state,t1.is_long_time, t1.id_expire_time,t1.invite_uid,t1.is_channel from plant_user t1 left join plant_user t2 on t1.invite_uid = t2.id where t1.id = #{id} and t1.user_state = 1

select
from plant_user
invite_uid = #{inviteId}
AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{startTime}) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(reg_time)
order by reg_time asc

select t1.id `userId`, t1.real_name `userName`, t1.phone, t1.reg_time, IFNULL(sum(t2.buy_count), 0) `buyCount`, IFNULL(sum(t2.plant_count), 0) `plantCount`, IFNULL(sum(t2.buy_amount), 0) `buyMoney`, t3.collect_money from plant_user t1 left join plant_seed_order t2 on t1.id = t2.user_id left join plant_user_money t3 on t1.id = t3.user_id
and t1.phone = #{upm.phone}
and unix_timestamp(t1.reg_time) >= unix_timestamp(#{upm.startTime})
and unix_timestamp(t1.reg_time) <= unix_timestamp(#{upm.endTime})
group by t2.user_id order by t1.reg_time asc
